entry.title: Winter Gnomes - Adhesive Decals
entry.summary:
Vendor: ScriptDesigns
Type: HTV Ready Made Decals
Price: 2.00 - 7.50 (20 variants)

Transform a baby bottle, a gift basket, a cup or anything else that comes to mind into something unique with our ready to apply HTV decals. 

SIZES

1)  I am the cutest

  • Extra-Small: 4 x 3.5 inches
  • Small: 5.5 x 4.9 inches
  • Medium: 7 x 6.25
  • Large: 8.5 x 7.6 inches
  • Extra-Large: 11 x 9.8 inches

2)  Other gnomes

  • Extra-Small: 4 x 2.4 inches
  • Small: 5.5 x 3.3 inches
  • Medium: 7 x 4.2 inches
  • Large: 8.5 x 5 inches
  • Extra-Large: 11 x 6.6 inches

Sizes may vary slightly than what is listed.  Custom sizes available upon request.

Our decals are printed professionally in-house on glossy Oracal 651 permanent vinyl equivalent. 

APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS

  • Clean the object with rubbing alcool and dry well.
  • Remove backing from the decal
  • Apply to the surface
  • Squeegee well; if there is no transfer tape (on smaller decals), use a protective cloth over the decal to protect it from scratching when rubbing with your squeegee.    

Do not put in dishwasher or soak in hot water.  Wash manually.

These decals have strong adhesive and are not suited for walls unless you apply a backing of Oracal 631 behind them.

entry.title: Fire Truck Adhesive Wall Decal
entry.summary:
Vendor: ScriptDesigns
Type: Adhesive Ready Made Decals
Price: 1.50 - 14.25 (12 variants)

Let your imagination flow!  These ready to apply adhesive decals will make a statement on your wood signs, mugs, tumblers or any other decorative elements.  They could become cute car decals or you could even create a beautiful set of frames for your walls by using a few different patterns.

Custom sizes available upon request.

These decals are printed professionally in-house on high quality Orajet, a permanent adhesive vinyl very similar to Oracal 651.  

APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS

Clean the surface very well prior to application.

For smaller sizes, simply peel and stick. 

For larger sizes, apply transfer tape (just like you would do for any other adhesive vinyl), transfer and stick.  Using the wet method will allow more time for positioning and significantly reduce the chances of having bubbles.

entry.title: Fun Flowers - Adhesive Vinyl Decals Collection (6 designs)
entry.summary:
Vendor: ScriptDesigns
Type: Peel & Stick Decals
Price: 1.50 - 35.10 (35 variants)

NOTE:  These designs have a small white border not noticeable in the picture

Let your imagination flow!  These ready to apply adhesive decals will make a statement on your wood signs, mugs, tumblers or any other decorative elements.  They could become cute car decals or you could even create a beautiful set of frames for your walls by using a few different patterns.

Custom sizes available upon request.

These decals are printed professionally in-house on high quality Orajet, a permanent adhesive vinyl very similar to Oracal 651.  They are also laminated with a thin layer of transparent vinyl to protect the colours from fading.

APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS

    Clean the surface very well prior to application.
    For smaller sizes, simply peel and stick. 
    For larger sizes, apply transfer tape (just like you would do for any other adhesive vinyl), transfer and stick.
